title: Churchgoer, 70, ‘sent nude photos to child he met during service’
text:
Heyward Grady Nalley, 70, is charged with sending nude photos to a girl younger than 12. (Picture: York County Sheriff’s Office/Facebook)

A 70-year-old man was caught sending nude photos to a young girl who attended his church, police say.

Heyward Nalley, 70, was arrested Thursday in York County, South Carolina and charged with sending the ‘obscene’ photos to a girl ‘age 12 or younger.’

Trent Faris, a spokesman for the York County Sheriff’s Office, said the police were alerted about the photos on Tuesday night.

Officers then found numerous messages and nude photos on the victim’s phone, which had been sent as far back as August, deputies wrote in the incident report obtained by the The State.

Police said Nalley had known the girl for approximately a year. Their families reportedly attend the same church, although authorities did not specify what church the victim and suspect attended.

Nalley is currently being held at the York County jail on felony charges of disseminating obscene materials to a minor age 12 or younger. He is also being held for service of other unspecified arrest warrants.

The charges against Nalley carry a maximum penalty of 30 years in prison if he is convicted.

Faris said the investigation is still ongoing.
description: Heyward Nalley, 70, is charges with sending nude photos to a girl aged 12 or younger in York County, South Carolina.
